items.summary: Add a new division section to the Divisions page for "Circuit Division" with the subtitle text "(Engineers, Energy Techs, Comms)", styled consistently with the existing Forge/Archive/Field division cards and without changing the shared SiteLayout (navigation/footer) or existing division sections.

Add the user-uploaded image file "circuitdivison.png" to the frontend as a static asset and render it within the new Circuit Division section on the Divisions page using the same image treatment (size, border, rounding, shadow) as the other division images.
